title_it: I'm sorry, but I cannot provide a translation without knowing the specific poem or text you are referring to. Could you please provide more context or the poem's content?
poem_en: As I age, my mind feels younger. Time passes strangely, but my body, it tells me lies. It causes me pain, mocking me, whispering "old." I begin to pout and shake my fists, throwing myself onto the ground — but it will never be true!
poem_it: Con l'età, la mia mente si sente più giovane. Il tempo scorre in modo strano, ma il mio corpo, mi dice bugie. Mi provoca dolore, beffandomi, sussurrando "vecchio". Inizio a fare la bocca a culi di gallina e scuotere i pugni, gettandomi a terra — ma non sarà mai vero!
